channel.title: Need Help with Server Status
channel.description:
Well, heres the problem.. I put my server on and the server status says its offline.. Below i listed what i did.
-Port Forward -No-ip is open/made -Server is on -Firewall is down
It keeps saying the samething. Please Help.. It would be Greatly Appreciated :confused:

item.title: Need Help with Server Status
item.dc:creator: @1c3_B4rr4g31 1c3 B4rr4g3
item.description:
@1c3_B4rr4g31 wrote:

oh ok… ill check[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 06:27:12 PM[/size][hr]Okay… I checked it… and i Did it right…

Ex:

Moparscape 43594 to 43594 Both My ip Enabled

My ip is written right

Did i do it right?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help with Server Status
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

[quote=“MasterBacus, post:2, topic:187944”]do you have your server running
and ports 43594 and 5555 ported[/quote]

Why would you need to forward two ports… Your WRONG

If he is running it on 43594, he only needs to forward port 43594. OFC!

@ 1c3

Check your port forwarding, you may have done it wrong…

Read full topic
